item.title: About Me
item.description: I build computing infrastructure. I founded a company called Solinea that helps clients do this too. As you can imagine from my blog content, Solinea focuses on clouds, OpenStack and Kubernetes. I used to do this for clients of Cloud Technology Partners (cloudTP), where I led their open source cloud infrastructure efforts. Before I joined cloudTP, I served as Director of Cloud Development for a cloud service provider (Internap Network Services), where I led their initial engineering efforts for their OpenStack public cloud.
